teal.ui.swing.borders

Class TextFieldBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
      • teal.ui.swing.borders.TextFieldBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.border.Border, javax.swing.plaf.UIResource

    public class TextFieldBorder
extends javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
implements javax.swing.plaf.UIResource
    This is a simple border class used for Text field.
